Articles.Content:
So I found this really cool website that gives you data from the Kepler Dpace Telescope, and has you analyze it, the main goal is to find transits (dimming of stars over a short period of time), most of these transits mark an Exo-Planet, which may or may not already have bean discovered!

[http://www.planethunters.org](http://www.planethunters.org)
